scripts.build: rm -rf ./out && next build && next export && echo iport.hejny.org > ./out/CNAME && echo > ./out/.nojekyll
scripts.prettier-commit: git diff --exit-code && npm run prettier && git add . && git commit --allow-empty -m "ðŸ§¹ Prettier"
scripts.preversion: git pull && npm run prettier-commit&& npm run lint && npm test
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && echo "Check the deploy process: https://github.com/hejny/iport/actions/"
